attributes.action: Reinstate compulsary Conscription of male and Females age 17 intl the UK Military Services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With all that is happening in the world today and with the UK being under threat from terrorists it time the Goverment reintroduced compulsary military service for all Male and females from the age 17 for a period of 3 years. thus bringing our military strenth back up to maximum as we are committed to several areas around the world, Britain is a top player in the worlds security so we need to be at full strenth to fill these committments. when the conscripts time is up there would be lots of highly trained people coming out onto our work place market looking able to fill skilled vacancies all over the spectrum.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
